about_the_game:
Gob Johnson's Downhill Marmalade is a fast-paced slalom 'em up fantasy rogue-like, featuring beloved household name Gob Johnson himself.

Avoid obstacles, smash into enemies, collect marmalade boons and do sick tricks.

A Radical Rogue-like

Start at the top of the highest peak and race to the the deepest depths to catch the sickest air.

Each run down the Great Mountain is different. Choose your path.

Unlock all Gob's friends

Unlock and play as a bunch of different characters, who all have unique powers.

Collect powerful marmalade boons

Collect Enchanted Marmalade to choose from a ton of boons.

Journey through the Radicallion on your quest

The world of Radicallion has many biomes to explore as you descend it's peak. Race down the mountain, skid through the mines, cause havoc in the city and much more.

name: Gob Johnson's Downhill Marmalade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Graphics: DirectX 12
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Fast-paced slalom 'em up fantasy rogue-like. Play as a radical goblin and his friends with a ton of different powers. Swerve past obstacles, do sick tricks, slam into enemies and collect boons as you make your way to the underworld to catch air off the The Ancient One's Halfpipe.
